visualizations.title: Actual vs Predicted Export Volumes
visualizations.description: Comparison of actual and predicted values for 2024-25 rice exports to Bangladesh

visualizations.title: Residual Distribution
visualizations.description: Histogram of prediction residuals (actual - predicted) showing normal distribution

insights: Model achieved near-perfect R² (0.9986) but extremely high MAPE (1445.29%)
Residuals show normal distribution with mean=0.0000 and std=9.8929
Predictions closely follow actual values in absolute terms
data.summary: Model demonstrates excellent absolute accuracy but problematic percentage errors. High R² indicates strong fit while high MAPE suggests issues with small actual values causing large relative errors.
data.task_answer: The model successfully captures export volume relationships for rice varieties to Bangladesh with high accuracy (R²=0.9986). However, the extremely high MAPE (1445.29%) indicates percentage errors are problematic, likely due to small actual values causing large relative errors. The model performs well in absolute terms but caution is needed when interpreting percentage accuracy.
